attributes.action: Include the Magna Carta 1215AD and the Declaration of Human Rights 1948AD into the British education system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that, for many years, the fundamental rights, enshrined forever by the Magna Carta 1215AD have been trampled over by various authorities in this country and continue to be trampled on.  Likewise, our rights under the Declaration of Human Rights 1948AD are also in threat through oppressive legislation by this and previous Governments, which has to end.  We remind the Government that any laws contrary to the Magna Carta 1215AD are null and void.  The Magna Carta is enshrined in English law forever!
